channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - 2.4

item.title: Moving closer to 2.4 stabilization
item.description: The SELinux userspace project has released version 2.4 in february this year, after release candidates have been tested for half a year. After its release, we at the Gentoo Hardened project have been working hard to integrate it within Gentoo. This effort has been made a bit more difficult â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
